original_title: Moonshine to the Finish Line: An Unofficial History of NASCAR
overview: ilmmaker John Lyons Murphy offers a look into a side of auto racing history most corporate sponsors prefer to ignore in Moonshine To The Finish Line: The Unofficial Beginnings Of NASCAR, which includes rare footage of early stock car races, vintage photographs and interviews with racing legends Junior Johnson, Bobby Allison and Tiger Tom Pistone.
title: Moonshine to the Finish Line: An Unofficial History of NASCAR
